headline: Is There Opportunity in UPS After Shares Fall 33% in 2024?
summary: If you hold shares of United Parcel Service or are eyeing an opportunity, you are probably wondering whether the recent downturn signals trouble or if it is a chance to pick up a misunderstood value. UPS has seen its stock price take a dive in 2024, dropping 33.1% year to date and losing nearly 42% over the past three and five years. Even in the past week, shares slipped another 4.3%. Much of this negative momentum traces back to shifting sentiment around global shipping demand and worries...

headline: FDX Looks to Cut Costs to Mitigate Demand Woes: What's the Road Ahead?
summary: FedEx targets $1 billion in new savings under DRIVE and Network 2.0 as weak demand and inflation weigh on shipping volumes.

headline: De Minimis’ Demise Sparks UPS Delays, Package Disposals Amid Customs Bottlenecks
summary: The end of duty-free import threshold has triggered a package pileup, causing customer complaints about their deliveries being disposed.

headline: Wall Street Breakfast Podcast: Crypto Bounces Back
summary: Crypto markets rebound as Trump signal openness to China trade deal. Xiaomi shares slide following reports of EV crash. UPS telling customers packages bound for the U.S. are being destroyed.

headline: Jim Cramer Discusses FedEx (FDX) & A Slowing Economy

FedEx Corporation (NYSE:FDX) is a frequent feature of Cramer’s morning show. He commonly comments on the firm’s CEO, Raj Subramaniam, and has discussed the firm’s recent […]
